extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime [B]0.3.0:[/B] - Fixed the multi-chapter context menu when using the "Clean Episode Titles" setting.
[B]0.2.9:[/B] - Changed the multi-chapter support to be a context-menu, "Play Chapters", so now it's optional.
[B]0.2.8:[/B] - Fixed a redirection bug in media grabbing code. - Added support for more types of chapters.
[B]0.2.7:[/B] - Added a custom skin layout setting (thanks SerpentDrago/Anon). - Minor change to media grabbing code.
